name: Claw (itch) (juner)
description:
Use your claw and the bolts around the level to navigate to the exit markers.

Clever use of your claw can help you spin around or detach the claw to re-orient yourself.

There are 12 levels to complete!

Controls

  • Move: Arrow Keys
  • Undo: Z
  • Reset level: X

---

Credits:
Art, level design, programming - Juner
Music - "Space" from Picotunes Vol.1, Composed by Gruber and used with permission

---

Inspirations:

Inspired by Stephen's Sausage Roll and Deadly Rooms of Death, this is my contribution to their brand of "tool-based puzzler".

---

Theming: The theme for the jam was "Joined together".

The claw can become attached and detached to help solve puzzles.

---

Future ideas

Originally each bolt was to be "joined" to another part around the level, e.g. walls, floors, and turning/moving the bolts would cause a reaction, but this ended up becoming out-of-scope through the jam.

Additionally I wanted to have the music joined to gameplay by having it react to the turning of bolts etc, but again this became out-of-scope.
